statements: SELECT * FROM threats
SELECT name, severity FROM threats WHERE severity > 5
SELECT description FROM threats WHERE id = 3
SELECT * FROM threats WHERE name LIKE 'Malware%'
SELECT id, name FROM threats ORDER BY severity DESC
SELECT * FROM threats WHERE severity > 5 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT id, name FROM threats WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT name, description FROM threats WHERE name LIKE '%malware%'
SELECT id, description FROM threats WHERE severity BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM threats WHERE name = 'Ransomware'
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceData
SELECT name, type, description FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE type = 'Malware'
SELECT DISTINCT type FROM ThreatIntelligenceData ORDER BY type ASC
SELECT name, type, description FROM ThreatIntelligenceData ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT AVG(strength) AS average_strength FROM ThreatAnalysis
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE severity = 'high' AND status = 'active';
SELECT threat_name, category, COUNT(*) AS num_threats FROM ThreatIntelligenceData GROUP BY threat_name, category ORDER BY num_threats DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT threat_name FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT threat_name, MAX(severity) AS max_severity FROM ThreatIntelligenceData GROUP BY threat_name ORDER BY max_severity DESC;
SELECT AVG(severity) AS avg_severity, MIN(severity) AS min_severity FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM ThreatIndicators ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT indicator_type, indicator_value FROM ThreatIndicators WHERE indicator_type='IP Address';
SELECT * FROM ThreatActor WHERE actor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, incident_name, incident_date FROM IncidentReports WHERE incident_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT actor_name, motivation, tactics FROM ThreatActor JOIN IncidentReports ON ThreatActor.id = IncidentReports.id;
SELECT * FROM ThreatIndicators WHERE id = 1;
SELECT indicator_type, indicator_value, description FROM ThreatIndicators WHERE indicator_type = 'Malware';
SELECT actor_name, motivation FROM ThreatActor WHERE motivation LIKE '%financial%';
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT incident_name, description FROM IncidentReports ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence;
SELECT threat_name, threat_level FROM threat_intelligence ORDER BY threat_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM intel_sources WHERE source_type = 'Malware';
SELECT source_name, source_url FROM intel_sources WHERE source_type <> 'Threat Actor';
SELECT analysis_date, analysis_result FROM intel_analysis WHERE analysis_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence WHERE threat_level > 2;
SELECT threat_name, threat_description FROM threat_intelligence WHERE threat_level < 2;
SELECT threat_name, threat_level FROM threat_intelligence WHERE threat_level BETWEEN 2 AND 5 ORDER BY threat_level DESC;
SELECT t.threat_name, s.source_name, a.analysis_date FROM threat_intelligence t, intel_sources s, intel_analysis a WHERE t.threat_id = 1 AND s.source_id = 1 AND a.analysis_id = 1;

SELECT t.threat_name, s.source_name, a.analysis_date FROM threat_intelligence t JOIN intel_relations r ON t.threat_id = r.threat_id JOIN intel_sources s ON r.source_id = s.source_id JOIN intel_analysis a ON r.analysis_id = a.analysis_id;
SELECT * FROM ThreatActors;
SELECT id, name, description FROM ThreatActors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name FROM ThreatActors ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Incidents WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT title, created_at FROM Reports ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM ThreatActors WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name, description FROM ThreatActors WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT title, content FROM Reports WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, status FROM Incidents WHERE severity = 'High';
